title: Things people say though the match.

YES THIS IS WHAT I DO WHEN I'M BORED, PROBLEM WITH THAT?!

replies.body:
Me: Why you went in?
X: Because it was a free kill dude!
Me: Yeah, you were the free kill
-X has left the game.-
It was such a sick burn that his computer and router spontaneously combusted. You cost him a lot of money, man.
{{champion:36}} When I play Mundo, I always chat like he does. "MUNDO BUY MR BECAUSE VLAD!"
I'm glad I'm not the only one who does this.  Mundo must always speak in all caps, usually starting each sentence with his name.
{{champion:36}}: "Mundo say his own name a lot, or else he forget!"

I started thinking about the last one.

Darn it, now my silver(soon to be gold, I hope) brain is about to explode!
What if they Negate each other?
tis unpossibilities my dear deer fallow
It's possible... though armor too counters lifesteal, and since thornmail gives both damage reflection and armor I'd say that thormail counters lifesteal more than lifesteal does thornmail.
DUN DUN DUUUUUUUUN

Thornmail counters lifesteal.
MR counters Thornmail.
MPen counters MR.
Health counters MPen.
AD counters Health.
Armor counters AD.
ArPen counters Armor.
Nothing counters ArPen.

Don't think about it too hard.

> [{quoted}](name=Daedalus871,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=Na6IymtH,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2015-11-03T05:16:27.121+0000)
>
> Thornmail counters lifesteal.
> MR counters Thornmail.
> MPen counters MR.
> Health counters MPen.
> AD counters Health.
> Armor counters AD.
> ArPen counters Armor.
> Nothing counters ArPen.
> 
> Don't think about it too hard.

arpen makes thornmail hurt more..
False. Thornmail calculates the damage prior to damage reductions and even states on the item that it calculates it before armor. :3
Countering isn't a transitive operation.

Usually inappropriate comments involving specific situations. I.E Warwick, me or the enemy, always ulting the same champ, specifically if they are a female champ... Stop humping me, and on and on actually got a couple of people to engage and continue that train of thought before, was pretty epic.  Even better when i was playing Kitty Katarina.

Also works with skarner, just say no i don't want to return to your den and bare your babies, so please stop trying to drag me there.
kinky
thornmail and lifesteal neutralize each other up to a certain point, but with more lifesteal options and thornmail passive being unique, lifesteal outscales thornmail to an extent

Thornmail actually overpowers lifesteal unless the ADC gets LF equivalent of 3 BT or 2 BT and 1 LW.

With only one BT/BoTRK plus a LW, most ADCs will lose 30 to 50% of their health fighting a full health tank assuming the ADC doesn't have MR.
The counter to Thornmail is actually Banshees or QSS.
 Most ADCs struggles to fight enemies with thornmail if the ADCs do not have LF and MR to back up their damage. A while ago before the Cinderhulk, Gromp, and Thornmail nerfs, ADCs would literally 100-0 themselves as long as they didn't build MR.

Actually i believe wit's end is far more effective a counter to thornmail.  You get mr, a stacking mr buff, stacking mr shred, attack speed, and on-hit magic damage.  That is a very cost effective means of weakening thornmail, throw in a last whisper and lifesteal and you are doing even better.

Oh definitely.
Almost any form of MR effectively counters thornmail. I just mentioned Banshees because most ADCs build that as their 6th item.

In terms of specifically countering thornmail, Wit's End is excellent. Thornmail can't reflect the magic damage, and Wit's End's MR mitigates most of the damage that does get reflected.

The only downside is that most ADCs can benefit from QSS or Banshees more since they can save the ADCs in a pinch.

> [{quoted}](name=Toa Innodence,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=Na6IymtH,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2015-11-03T02:23:52.351+0000)
>
> thornmail and lifesteal neutralize each other up to a certain point, but with more lifesteal options and thornmail passive being unique, lifesteal outscales thornmail to an extent

do you think it would be too powerful if they changed it the way they did in dota? it was originally a lot like thornmail.. always passive and returned i think 30%? or something physical dmg only.. the new one you can activate to return 100% dmg for 4.5 secs every 15 secs. yeah i think it would be overpowered in this game nvm.

I think that lifesteal should outrank thornmail-under-constant-return-of-damage-for-a-percent, but only just. for instance, if someone is dealing ad, if you match it with thorn mail, they should be able to buy one third tier item to out life-steal you. two thornmails? two lifesteals to surpass, but to even make a dent on a third life-steal item, you may need to buy a toatal of 4 thornmail items, which is a waste of itemization punishing for being too invested in making another champion useless to you. I additionally think that there should be an ap version of thorns called reflection to counter spellvamp, but should follow the same guidelines as thorns in terms of what outranks what. it creates a meaningful decision on weather to focus on your output or counter to another champion's strenghts, creating a complex and imperfectly balanced web [we don't want invincible tanks now do we?]. 

I've been putting lots of thoughts into what needs to be adjusted with the upcoming pre-season including yasuo adjustments (the key is to attatch some of his passives [crit damage reduction, shield health, sheild recharge, armor pen] to the rank of his abilities and scale them exponentially between level 1 and 18!).

> [{quoted}](name=Toa Innodence,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=Na6IymtH,comment-id=000900000000,timestamp=2015-11-03T02:51:39.996+0000)
>
> I think that lifesteal should outrank thornmail-under-constant-return-of-damage-for-a-percent, but only just. for instance, if someone is dealing ad, if you match it with thorn mail, they should be able to buy one third tier item to out life-steal you. two thornmails? two lifesteals to surpass, but to even make a dent on a third life-steal item, you may need to buy a toatal of 4 thornmail items, which is a waste of itemization punishing for being too invested in making another champion useless to you. I additionally think that there should be an ap version of thorns called reflection to counter spellvamp, but should follow the same guidelines as thorns in terms of what outranks what. it creates a meaningful decision on weather to focus on your output or counter to another champion's strenghts, creating a complex and imperfectly balanced web [we don't want invincible tanks now do we?]. 
> 
> I've been putting lots of thoughts into what needs to be adjusted with the upcoming pre-season including yasuo adjustments (the key is to attatch some of his passives [crit damage reduction, shield health, sheild recharge, armor pen] to the rank of his abilities and scale them exponentially between level 1 and 18!).

well, u gotta put into factor the role of tanks.. if they are being attacked instead of their team in team fights.. they are accomplishing their primary role. that's why an activation for it would be good...if they still have it on while they're just running away it seems a little unfair. but if they roll in and activate it like a baller with the rest of their team behind their concrete wall, it's justified. tbh, idk if they could really put this change to use though since how this game is built.. there's only AP and AD... there is no strength, intelligence, and agility that constitutes hp/mana/armor/attack speed. the most easy counter to it for ads are items that are still good with them but do not rely on ad. bork/shiv.. but the thing is that it returns physical dmg in magic dmg... so the more phys u have the more ur getting hit by magic.. and most ad don't build for mr either.. or rather there aren't many if any at all that i know of good ad items that also have mr. dervish isn't bad but it's kinda sad the melees get the huge movespeed buff and ranged don't.

"i'm a diamond smurf" opposing team's allchat
"i'm plat iv" opposing team's allchat
before game even starts.
i say
"i'm not a smurf, but i've been playing mobas before this game was conceived, what rank does that make me?"
diamond vayne says "a god"
"ok, well, i'm sure u won't have too much trouble vs this one furreals miss diamond VAYNE"
nothing else is said for much of the rest of the match but
we lose before 20 minutes
"ggwp"
